channel.title: Posts on Algebra
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Algebra

item.title: Groups
item.description:
Quotient Group and Homomorphisms.

  • Definition of groups
  • Group is a disjoint union of cosets
  • $G/N$ is a group iff $N\trianglelefteq G$
  • The natural projectino from $G$ onto $G/N$ is a homomorphism
  • If $G/Z(G)$ is cyclic, then $G$ is abelian
  • Isomorphism theorems

Group Actions.

  • Definition of group actions
  • $G/\ker \pi \hookrightarrow S_A$
    • left multiplication on left cosets
    • conjugation on elements in a normal subgroup
  • Orbit-stabilizer theorem
  • A groups is a disjoint union of its orbits
  • Symmetric group

Sylow Theorems.
